      • changeDisjointORMultiFile

        public static java.lang.String changeDisjointORMultiFile(java.lang.String path,
                                         java.lang.String classToFind,
                                         java.lang.String classToAdd,
                                         java.lang.String actionType)
        Reads from the Disjointness file the lines (that contain string of the type A:B,M,N) the line that starts with the classToFind variable and depending on the actionType adds or removes the classToAdd
        Parameters:
        path - where the file is
        classToFind -
        classToAdd -
        actionType - add or remove
        Returns:
        the new altered file content as a string
